title: something similar to continuum
content:
Hi There,

I would appreciate some help. I've got Continuum (example). But I was wondering if there's a more 'professional' font like this (porsche like, blocky retro-tech sans).

Thanks for your help and suggestions...

Marco

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122232259im_/http:/typophile.com/files/contb_4350.gif)
author: Marco

comments.content:
Btw. this is a Elsner+Flake font called Digital Sans EF  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122232259/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/")

Oh, it must be in the air
